english.segment1: Call me prodigal. Call me anything You like. I've spent so long in the darkness. I'll do anything to step into the light
english.segment2: I don't expect You to love me. I don't expect You to need me
english.segment3: I tried my best to run away. But You say that none of it matters to You. You loved me when I lost my way. Cause You say that none of it matters to You
english.segment4: Call me prodigal. Call me broken and ashamed. Call me anything that I deserve. Cause I don't deserve my name
english.segment5: I don't expect You to want me. I don't expect You to love me
english.segment6: And I'm lost without You. Cause I'm holding on to You. Just when I start to doubt. I find You waiting, You're still waiting
